name: Spider Solitaire by Playfrog
description:
One of the most popular solitaire, you can choose the difficulty level at will, everyone loves it!


This game becomes famous since it’s included in Microsoft Windows. We have the honor of offering a high-quality version with great interface for iPad.

Except for Two suits, you are enabled to choose from 1 suit to 4 suits.
1 suit are all Spades, two suits: Spades and Hearts, 3 suits: Spades, Hearts and Clubs, 4 suits: Spades, Hearts, Clubs and Diamonds . The 1 suit is the easiest and 4 suits are most difficult, different level will help to relax and brainstorm.
For the detailed rules, please click the HELP button in game.


This game is fit for both novice and experienced players, how can you miss it?

*****************************************************************

Klondike
Freecell
Solitaire

Please feel free to give us any of your feedback. Thanks for your support!
